divs: Sighting DetailsFour or five of us were walking up the side walk between apartment buildings. A twelve year old little girl we were with said "What is that" and i looked up at a seventy five degree angel in the sky. They were a long width of stars three in a row on top then three in a row on bottem. the two on the right moved up then came back down in formation as i recall. After that the two on the left went up and came back down in to formation. And the middle repeated. The six moved into a straight line. and then took off in a wavy motion farther out through the stars, at speeds too fast for what normal flights could have done. I imidatly thought it was a UFO. When seeing it it almost made me want to cry.
Summary: Six Circular lights did little dance and took off in wavy motion behind stars
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ontario
There were no other sightings in Ontario on or around April 27th 1994
